summary: this mod adds alchemy labs to all the inns/taverns that are far from main cities. there was a time i was off wandering around and i came to Nightgate Inn, and i was let down there wasnt an alchemy lab there, it would of been great.... well now there is! the main cities have alchemy stores with labs in them, so i didnt add labs to the city inns.
descriptionHtml:
Cao Alchemy Labs in Taverns

this mod adds alchemy labs to all the inns/taverns that are far from main cities. there was a time i was off wandering around and i came to Nightgate Inn, and i was let down there wasnt an alchemy lab there, it would of been great.... well now there is! the main cities have alchemy stores with labs in them, so i didnt add labs to the city inns.

the following inns now have alchemy labs:

Braidwood Inn (Kynesgrove)

Nightgate Inn

Old Hroldan

Vilemyr Inn (town of Ivarstead)

Frostfruit Inn (town of Rorikstead)

Four Shields Tavern (town of Dragonbridge)

(riverwood\'s tavern already has an alchemy lab)

-enter the tavern/inn ... the alchemy lab is to your right.
________________

If you could donate, it would be great, I spent many hours before the creation kit was released to create this mod, my paypal email is xfriedcod@gmail.com, thank you.
________________

HOW TO INSTALL ++

use Curse Client http://www.curse.com/client

or

place \"cao_tavernAlchLab.esp\" into Skyrim DATA folder

in the launcher tick the checkbox. ... data files grayed out? -scroll down*

    * Data Files grayed out? 

Go to: Drive Letter:\\Program Files\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Skyrim\\SkyrimPrefs.ini

For those who don\'t have bought the game on steam, the SkyrimPrefs.ini file is located in Drive Letter:\\Users\\<USERNAME>\\Documents\\My Games\\Skyrim

Add these lines, or change them if they already exist so they match the below:

[Launcher] bEnableFileSelection=1

If that fails: Go to: Drive Letter:\\Users\\[USERNAME]\\AppData\\Local\\Skyrim Make the Skyrim folder un-read only.
author: CaoMengde777
